title: Countdown to a hit
author: VD
content_html:
By the time the Clinton Machine is finished, there won’t be any more talk about President Hussein. If he’s lucky, the only question will be to which nation he will accept exile. Can you even imagine this article being permitted to appear in the New York Times six months ago?

As the son of the Muslim father, Senator Obama was born a Muslim under Muslim law as it is universally understood. It makes no difference that, as Senator Obama has written, his father said he renounced his religion. Likewise, under Muslim law based on the Koran his mother’s Christian background is irrelevant.

It looks rather like the Lizard Queen nailed down the NYT with her tough talk on obliterating Iran.
content_text:
By the time the Clinton Machine is finished, there won’t be any more talk about President Hussein.  If he’s lucky, the only question will be to which nation he will accept exile.  Can you even imagine
this article being permitted to appear
in the New York Times six months ago?
As the son of the Muslim father, Senator Obama was born a Muslim under Muslim law as it is universally understood. It makes no difference that, as Senator Obama has written, his father said he renounced his religion. Likewise, under Muslim law based on the Koran his mother’s Christian background is irrelevant.
It looks rather like the Lizard Queen nailed down the NYT with her tough talk on obliterating Iran.
